I was looking at some classic TA earlier and found a pdf of the instructions form one I remember well called Rick Hanson.

In the instructions it explains how multiple commands can be entered in the same line, so for instance if you know the route to a destination you can speed things up by saying, **n e n** (north, then east, then north).

Out of interest I checked one of my games to see if this just happened to be a default of Quest, but it appears not.

I don't suppose there's any scripts that would allow for this, is there? Or would it better submitted as a request for future updates?

You can activate "Allow input of multiple commands in one line separeted by ." in the features tab of game so you could do n. e. n
But if I remember right multiple commands will be removed in Quest 6. They cause problems with turn scripts.
